alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Transylvania, south central Henderson and northwestern Greenville Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dupont State Forest, or 4 miles southeast of Brevard, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Laurel Park, Dupont State Forest, Jones Gap State Park, Valley Hill, Little River In Transylvania County, Penrose, Crab Creek, Cedar Mountain, and Connestee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
